subject: Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
Hockey, Ice
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Prospects for a prompt end to the National Hockey League lockout all but vanished Thursday after Commissioner Gary Bettman dismissed a new players union proposal as “a step backward.”
